roleset.name: match exactly, like an identical twin
roleset.note: TWIN-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. No VNcls. (from twin.01-v)

example.name: 2 matched things
example.text: [The Nagymaros dam]-3 was designed [*trace*-3]-2 [*trace*-2]-1 to be twinned *trace*-1 with another dam, now nearly complete, 100 miles upstream in Czechoslovakia.
example.arg: with another dam, now nearly complete, 100 miles upstream in Czechoslovakia
